6.7.9 Persistent storage for in-process compound document servers

OLE-part-Load-From-Stream

Open generic function

Summary

Read the object's persistent data from the given stream.

Signature

OLE-part-Load-From-Stream obj stream => ()

Arguments

obj
An instance of your subclass of <ole-in-process-server>.

stream
An instance of <storage-istream>.

Values

None.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Read the object's persistent data from the given stream. This is similar to OLE-part-Load-From-Storage, page 281, except that the stream is provided instead of you having to create and remember it.

Note: There is no default method for this generic function. You must provide a method yourself.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
